All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    ActiveInformationCalculatorDiscrete
    Active Information Storage calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data.
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculator
    Interface for implementations of Active Information Storage estimators on continuous univariate data (ie double[] arrays).
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorGaussian
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculator) which is affected using a Gaussian Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian) to make the calculations.
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKernel
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculator) which is affected using a box-kernel Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel) to make the calculations.
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculator) which is affected using a Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov) to make the calculations.
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate
    Interface for implementations of Active Information Storage estimators on multivariate continuous time-series data.
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator for multivariate time-series data (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate) which is affected using a Gaussian Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian) to make the calculations.
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKernel
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator for multivariate time-series data (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate) which is affected using a box-kernel Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel) to make the calculations.
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator for multivariate time-series data (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate) which is affected using a Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov) to make the calculations.
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariateViaMutualInfo
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorMultiVariate) which is affected using a given Mutual Information (MI) calculator (implementing MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate) to make the calculations.
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculator) which is affected using a given Mutual Information (MI) calculator (implementing MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate) to make the calculations.
    AnalyticMeasurementDistribution
    Generic class to represent analytic distributions of info theoretic measurements under some null hypothesis of a relationship between the variables.
    AnalyticNullDistributionComputer
    Calculators implementing this interface must provide a AnalyticNullDistributionComputer.computeSignificance() method to compute the statistical significance of their measurement, returning an analytically determined distribution AnalyticMeasurementDistribution.
    ArrayFileReader
    Reads basic files with one or two dimensional arrays of integers and doubles, delimited by space, tab or comma.
    ArrayFileWriter
    Writes basic files with one or two dimensional arrays of integers and doubles and booleans, delimited by tab.
    BlockEntropyCalculatorDiscrete
    Block entropy calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data (ie computes entropy over blocks of consecutive states in time).
    ChannelCalculator
    A basic interface for calculators computing measures on a univariate channel for continuous (ie double[]) data from a source to a destination time-series (ie mutual information and transfer entropy).
    ChannelCalculatorCommon
    A basic interface for calculators computing measures on a channel from a source to a destination time-series (i.e.
    ChannelCalculatorDiscrete
    A basic interface for calculators computing measures on a univariate channel for discrete (ie int[]) data from a source to a destination time-series (ie mutual information and transfer entropy).
    ChannelCalculatorMultiVariate
    A basic interface for calculators computing measures on a multivariate channel from a source to a destination time-series (i.e.
    ChiSquareMeasurementDistribution
    Class to represent analytic distributions of info theoretic measurements under some null hypothesis of a relationship between the variables, where the distribution of a function of those information-theoretic measurements is a Chi Square distribution.
    CombinedActiveEntRateCalculatorDiscrete
    A combined calculator for the active information, entropy rate and entropy.
    ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate
    Interface for implementations of the conditional mutual information, which may be applied to either multivariate or merely univariate continuous data.
    ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian
    Computes the differential conditional mutual information of two multivariate double[][] sets of observations, conditioned on another (implementing ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate), assuming that the probability distribution function for these observations is a multivariate Gaussian distribution.
    ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov
    Computes the differential conditional mutual information of two multivariate double[][] sets of observations, conditioned on another (implementing ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate), using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see references below).
    ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov1
    Computes the differential conditional mutual information of two multivariate double[][] sets of observations, conditioned on another (implementing ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate), using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see references below) algorithm 1.
    ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov2
    Computes the differential conditional mutual information of two multivariate double[][] sets of observations, conditioned on another (implementing ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate), using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see references below) algorithm 2.
    ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscrete
    A conditional mutual information calculator between a joint set of continuous variables, and a discrete variable, conditioned on another discrete variable.
    ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscreteKraskov
    Compute the Conditional Mutual Information between a discrete variable and a vector of continuous variables, conditioned on another vector of continuous variables using the Kraskov estimation method.
    ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscreteSource
    A conditional mutual information calculator between a joint set of continuous variables, and a discrete variable, conditioned on another continuous variable vector.
    ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscreteSourceCommon
    This is an abstract calculator to compute the Conditional Mutual Information I(X;D|Z) between a discrete variable D and a vector of continuous variables X, conditioned on another vector of continuous variables Z.
    ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscreteSourceGaussian
    Computes the differential conditional mutual information of a given multivariate set of observations with a discrete variable, conditioned on another multivariate set of observations, assuming that the probability distribution function for these continuous observations is a multivariate Gaussian distribution.
    ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscreteSymbolic
    These calculators are EXPERIMENTAL -- not properly tested, and not well documented.
    ConditionalMutualInfoMultiVariateCommon
    Implements ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate to provide a base class with common functionality for child class implementations of ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate via various estimators.
    ConditionalMutualInformationCalculatorDiscrete
    Conditional Mutual information (MI) calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data.
    ConditionalTransferEntropyCalculator
    Interface for implementations of the conditional transfer entropy (conditional TE), which may be applied to univariate continuous time-series data.
    ConditionalTransferEntropyCalculatorDiscrete
    Implements conditional transfer entropy for univariate discrete time-series data.
    ConditionalTransferEntropyCalculatorGaussian
    Computes the differential conditional transfer entropy (TE) between two univariate double[] time-series of observations (implementing ConditionalTransferEntropyCalculator), assuming that the probability distribution function for these observations is a multivariate Gaussian distribution.
    ConditionalTransferEntropyCalculatorKraskov
    Computes the differential conditional transfer entropy (TE) between two univariate double[] time-series of observations (implementing ConditionalTransferEntropyCalculator), using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see references below).
    ConditionalTransferEntropyCalculatorViaCondMutualInfo
    A Conditional Transfer Entropy (TE) calculator (implementing ConditionalTransferEntropyCalculator) which is affected using a given Conditional Mutual Information (MI) calculator (implementing ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate) to make the calculations.
    ContextOfPastMeasureCalculatorDiscrete
    A base class for calculators computing measures which require knowledge of the embedded past state of a univariate discrete (ie int[]) variable.
    DualTotalCorrelationCalculatorDiscrete
    Computes the dual total correlation (DTC) of a given multivariate int[][] set of observations (extending MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete).
    DualTotalCorrelationCalculatorGaussian
    Computes the differential dual total correlation (DTC) of a given multivariate double[][] set of observations (extending MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorGaussian), assuming that the probability distribution function for these observations is a multivariate Gaussian distribution.
    DualTotalCorrelationCalculatorKraskov
    Computes the differential dual total correlation of a given multivariate set of observations, using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see Kraskov et al., below).
    EmpiricalMeasurementDistribution
    Structure to hold a distribution of info-theoretic measurements, and a significance value for how an original measurement compared with these, which is determined empirically by bootstrapping.
    EmpiricalNullDistributionComputer
    Calculators implementing this interface must provide EmpiricalNullDistributionComputer.computeSignificance(int) and EmpiricalNullDistributionComputer.computeSignificance(int[][]) methods to compute the statistical significance of their measurement, returning an empirically determined distribution EmpiricalMeasurementDistribution.
    EntropyCalculator
    Interface for implementations of entropy estimators on continuous univariate data (ie double[] arrays).
    EntropyCalculatorDiscrete
    Entropy calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data.
    EntropyCalculatorGaussian
    Computes the differential entropy of a given set of observations (implementing EntropyCalculator, assuming that the probability distribution function for these observations is Gaussian.
    EntropyCalculatorKernel
    Computes the differential entropy of a given set of observations (implementing EntropyCalculator, using box-kernel estimation.
    EntropyCalculatorMultiVariate
    Interface for implementations of entropy estimators on continuous multivariate data (ie double[][] arrays where first index is time or observation number, second is variable index).
    EntropyCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian
    Computes the differential entropy of a given multivariate set of observations (implementing EntropyCalculatorMultiVariate, assuming that the probability distribution function for these observations is Gaussian.
    EntropyCalculatorMultiVariateKernel
    Computes the differential entropy of a given set of observations (implementing EntropyCalculatorMultiVariate, using box-kernel estimation.
    EntropyCalculatorMultiVariateKozachenko
    Computes the differential entropy of a given set of observations (implementing EntropyCalculatorMultiVariate, using the Kozachenko-Leonenko estimator.
    EntropyRateCalculatorDiscrete
    Entropy rate calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data (ie computes entropy over blocks of consecutive states in time).
    EuclideanUtils
    A set of utilities for manipulating vectors in Euclidean space.
    FirstIndexComparatorDouble
    Class used to sort an array of array of doubles based on the first element in each array.
    FirstIndexComparatorInteger
    Class used to sort an array of array of doubles based on the first element in each array.
    InfoMeasureCalculatorContinuous
    Base interface for our information-theoretic calculators on continuous (double[]) data, providing common functionality for user-level measure classes.
    InfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete
    Base class for our information-theoretic calculators on discrete (int[]) data, providing common functionality for user-level measure classes.
    IntArrayWrapper
    IntArrayWrapper is used to wrap a long array so as to be able to give it a hash value for placement into a hash table.
    InterregionalChannelMeasure
    Compute a significance score for an inter-regional channel measure between two sets, based on looking at the channel measure between elements taken jointVars1 and jointVars2 at a time.
    InterregionalMutualInfo
    Compute a significance score for the inter-regional mutual information between two sets, based on looking at transfer between elements taken e at a time.
    InterregionalTransferEntropy
    Compute a significance score for the inter-regional transfer entropy between two sets, based on looking at transfer between elements taken e at a time.
    KdTree
    K-d tree implementation to be used for fast neighbour searching across several (multi-dimensional) variables.
    KernelCount
    Structure to hold a kernel count, the total count it was taken from, and an array of booleans indicating which time points got counted.
    KernelEstimatorMultiVariate
    Class to maintain probability distribution function for a multivariate set, using kernel estimates.
    KernelEstimatorTransferEntropy
    Kernel estimator for computing PDFs ready for the transfer entropy.
    KernelEstimatorTransferEntropyMultiVariate
    Kernel estimator for use with the transfer entropy on multivariate source and destination.
    KernelEstimatorUniVariate
    Class to maintain probability distribution function for a single variable, using kernel estimates.
    MathsUtils
    This class implements a number of static methods for mathematical functions.
    MatrixUtils
    Utilities for computations on arrays and matrices of data.
    MeasurementDistribution
    Structure to hold a distribution of info-theoretic measurements, and a significance value for how an original measurement compared with these.
    MeasurementDistributionPermutationsOverSubsets
    Extends MeasurementDistribution for computations over large sets where we generate measures over permutations of subsets.
    MultiInfoCalculator
    Interface for implementations of the multi-information or integration, which may be applied to either multivariate or merely univariate continuous data.
    MultiInfoCalculatorCommon
    Implements MultiInfoCalculator to provide a base class with common functionality for child class implementations of MultiInfoCalculator via various estimators.
    MultiInfoCalculatorGaussian
    Computes the differential multi-information of a given multivariate double[][] set of observations (implementing MultiInfoCalculator), assuming that the probability distribution function for these observations is a multivariate Gaussian distribution.
    MultiInfoCalculatorKernel
    Computes the differential multi-information of a given multivariate set of observations (implementing MultiInfoCalculator), using box-kernel estimation.
    MultiInfoCalculatorKraskov
    Computes the differential multi-information of a given multivariate set of observations (implementing MultiInfoCalculator), using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see Kraskov et al., below).
    MultiInfoCalculatorKraskov1
    Computes the differential multi-information of two given multivariate sets of observations (implementing MultiInfoCalculator), using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see Kraskov et al., below), algorithm 1.
    MultiInfoCalculatorKraskov2
    Computes the differential multi-information of two given multivariate sets of observations (implementing MultiInfoCalculator), using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see Kraskov et al., below), algorithm 2.
    MultiInformationCalculatorDiscrete
    Multi-information or integration calculator for multivariate discrete data.
    MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorCommon
    Implements a base class with common functionality for child class implementations of multivariate information measures via various estimators.
    MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete
    Implements a base class with common functionality for child class implementations of multivariate information measures.
    MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorGaussian
    Base class with common functionality for child class implementations of multivariate information measures on a given multivariate double[][] set of observations (extending MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorCommon), assuming that the probability distribution function for these observations is a multivariate Gaussian distribution.
    MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorKraskov
    Base class with common functionality for child class implementations of multivariate information measures on a given multivariate double[][] set of observations (extending MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorCommon), using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see Kraskov et al., below).
    MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate
    Interface for implementations of the mutual information, which may be applied to either multivariate or merely univariate continuous data.
    MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian
    Computes the differential mutual information of two given multivariate double[][] sets of observations (implementing MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate), assuming that the probability distribution function for these observations is a multivariate Gaussian distribution.
    MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel
    Computes the differential mutual information of two given multivariate sets of observations (implementing MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate), using box-kernel estimation.
    MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov
    Computes the differential mutual information of two given multivariate sets of observations (implementing MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate), using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see Kraskov et al., below).
    MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov1
    Computes the differential mutual information of two given multivariate sets of observations (implementing MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate), using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see Kraskov et al., below), algorithm 1.
    MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov2
    Computes the differential mutual information of two given multivariate sets of observations (implementing MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate), using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see Kraskov et al., below), algorithm 2.
    MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscrete
    Interface defining computation of the differential mutual information between a given multivariate set of observations and a discrete variable.
    MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscreteGaussian
    Computes the differential mutual information between a given multivariate set of observations (assuming that the probability distribution function for these observations is a multivariate Gaussian distribution) and a discrete variable.
    MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscreteKernel
    These calculators are EXPERIMENTAL -- not properly tested, and not well documented.
    MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscreteKraskov
    Compute the Mutual Information between a vector of continuous variables and discrete variable using the Kraskov estimation method.
    MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscreteSymbolic
    These calculators are EXPERIMENTAL -- not properly tested, and not well documented.
    MutualInfoMultiVariateCommon
    Implements MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate to provide a base class with common functionality for child class implementations of MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate via various estimators.
    MutualInformationCalculatorDiscrete
    Mutual information (MI) calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data.
    NativeUtils
    A simple library class which helps with loading dynamic libraries stored in the JAR archive.
    NearestNeighbourSearcher
    Generic class for fast neighbour searching possibly across several (multi-dimensional) variables.
    NeighbourNodeData
    Class for storing nearest neighbour values during the search
    NonPositiveDefiniteMatrixException
    An exception class to signal that an input matrix was not positive definite
    OctaveFileReader
    Octave text file format reader.
    OctaveFileWriter
    Octave text file format writer.
    OctaveMatrix  
    OInfoCalculatorDiscrete
    Computes the O-information of a given multivariate int[][] set of observations (extending MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete).
    OInfoCalculatorGaussian
    Computes the differential O-information of a given multivariate double[][] set of observations (extending MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorGaussian), assuming that the probability distribution function for these observations is a multivariate Gaussian distribution.
    OInfoCalculatorKraskov
    Computes the differential O-information of a given multivariate set of observations, using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see Kraskov et al., below).
    ParsedProperties
    Utility to parse properties files and retrieve requested property values.
    PredictiveInfoCalculator
    Interface for implementations of Predictive Information / Excess Entropy estimators on continuous univariate data (ie double[] arrays).
    PredictiveInfoCalculatorGaussian
    A Predictive Information (PI) / Excess Entropy calculator (implementing PredictiveInfoCalculator) which is affected using a Gaussian Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian) to make the calculations.
    PredictiveInfoCalculatorKernel
    A Predictive Information (PI) / Excess Entropy calculator (implementing PredictiveInfoCalculator) which is affected using a box-kernel Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel) to make the calculations.
    PredictiveInfoCalculatorKraskov
    A Predictive Information (PI) / Excess Entropy calculator (implementing PredictiveInfoCalculator) which is affected using a Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov) to make the calculations.
    PredictiveInfoCalculatorViaMutualInfo
    A Predictive Information (PI) / Excess Entropy calculator (implementing PredictiveInfoCalculator) which is affected using a given Mutual Information (MI) calculator (implementing MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate) to make the calculations.
    PredictiveInformationCalculatorDiscrete
    Predictive information calculator for univariate discrete (int[]) data.
    RandomGenerator
    Utility to generate arrays of random variables TODO I think I may need to revisit whether I reuse the objects added to the hashtable; I don't think we should be doing this.
    SeparableInfoCalculatorDiscrete
    Implements separable information (see Lizier et al, 2010, below).
    SeparableInfoCalculatorDiscreteByAddition
    Implements separable information (see Lizier et al, 2010, below), by using separate Transfer Entropy and Active information storage calculators.
    SInfoCalculatorDiscrete
    Computes the S-information of a given multivariate int[][] set of observations (extending MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorDiscrete).
    SInfoCalculatorGaussian
    Computes the differential S-information of a given multivariate double[][] set of observations (extending MultiVariateInfoMeasureCalculatorGaussian), assuming that the probability distribution function for these observations is a multivariate Gaussian distribution.
    SInfoCalculatorKraskov
    Computes the differential S-information of a given multivariate set of observations, using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see Kraskov et al., below).
    SingleAgentMeasureDiscrete
    Interface for calculators of information-theoretic measures for single variables (e.g.
    SingleAgentMeasureDiscreteInContextOfPastCalculator
    A base class for calculators computing measures for a single variable which require knowledge of the embedded past state of a univariate discrete (ie int[]) variable.
    TransferEntropyCalculator
    Interface for implementations of the transfer entropy (TE), which may be applied to univariate continuous time-series data.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorDiscrete
    Implements transfer entropy for univariate discrete time-series data.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorGaussian
    Computes the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two univariate double[] time-series of observations (implementing TransferEntropyCalculator), assuming that the probability distribution function for these observations is a multivariate Gaussian distribution.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorKernel
    Computes the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two univariate double[] time-series of observations using box-kernel estimation.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorKernelPlain
    Computes the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two uniivariate double[] time-series of observations using box-kernel estimation.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorKernelPlainIterators  
    TransferEntropyCalculatorKernelSeparate
    Computes the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two uniivariate double[] time-series of observations using box-kernel estimation.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorKraskov
    Computes the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two univariate double[] time-series of observations (implementing TransferEntropyCalculator), using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see references below).
    TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariate
    Interface for implementations of the transfer entropy (TE), which may be applied to multivariate continuous time-series data.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian
    Computes the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two multivariate double[][] time-series of observations (implementing TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariate), assuming that the probability distribution function for these observations is a multivariate Gaussian distribution.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariateKernel
    Computes the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two multivariate double[][] time-series of observations using box-kernel estimation.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov
    Computes the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two multivariate double[][] time-series of observations (implementing TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariate), using Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) estimation (see references below).
    TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariateSingleObservationsKernel
    Extends TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariateKernel for computing the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two multivariate double[][] time-series of observations using box-kernel estimation.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariateViaCondMutualInfo
    A Multivariate Transfer Entropy (TE) calculator (implementing TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariate) which is affected using a given Conditional Mutual Information (MI) calculator (implementing ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate) to make the calculations.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorSpiking
    Interface for implementations of the transfer entropy (TE), which may be applied to spiking time-series data.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorSpiking.SpikingLocalInformationValues
    This interface serves to indicate the return type of TransferEntropyCalculator#computeLocalOfPreviousObservations() as each child implementation will return something specific
    TransferEntropyCalculatorSpikingIntegration
    Computes the transfer entropy between a pair of spike trains, using an integration-based measure in order to match the theoretical form of TE between such spike trains.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorSymbolic
    Computes the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two univariate double[] time-series of observations using symbolic TE estimation.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorViaCondMutualInfo
    A Transfer Entropy (TE) calculator (implementing TransferEntropyCalculator) which is affected using a given Conditional Mutual Information (MI) calculator (implementing ConditionalMutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate) to make the calculations.
    TransferEntropyCommon
    Implements TransferEntropyCalculator to provide a base class with common functionality for child class implementations of pairwise or apparent transfer entropy (TE), defined by TransferEntropyCalculator, on double[] data via various estimators.
    TransferEntropyKernelCounts
    Structure to hold the results of the box-kernel estimation counts for one sample point.
    UnivariateNearestNeighbourSearcher
    Class for fast neighbour searching in a single dimensional variable.
